Recommendations.Title: Solar Together Hertfordshire
Key Strengths: Provides information on a community solar scheme
Discusses the need for planning permission for solar installations
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link discusses a popular solar energy program in Hertfordshire, which council customers may be interested in learning about. Additionally, it touches upon the need for planning permission on solar panel installations, which is pertinent to the given instruction.

Recommendations.Title: Pre-application Advice - Planning
Key Strengths: Provides pre-application advice on planning matters, including solar panels
Mentions permitted development for certain renewable energy projects
Recommendations.Reasoning: This resource is a pre-planning advice page that covers various building alterations, including relevant information on solar panels as a permitted development. It may be helpful to council customers seeking guidance before submitting a planning application.

Recommendations.Title: Online Applications - Planning
Key Strengths: Alows users to apply for planning permission online
Lists types of applications including solar panels installation
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides council customers with the option to submit an online application, which might be useful for installing new solar panels. The list of application categories mentions solar panels as a relevant type of development.

Recommendations.Title: Agenda item - 24/00252/FP - 23-39 CUTTYS LANE, STEVENAGE
Key Strengths: Discusses the installation of solar panels in a specific location
Offers insight into planning permissions for solar panel installations
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides information on a specific planning application involving the installation of solar panels, which might give council customers an idea of what to expect when submitting their own application.

Recommendations.Title: STEVENAGE DESIGN GUIDANCE Supplementary Planning ...
Key Strengths: Offers guidelines for sustainable buildings and structures
Discusses the incorporation of solar energy systems
Recommendations.Reasoning: While not directly related to existing planning applications, this design guidance document offers valuable information about sustaining structures with solar panels. This resource could help council customers ensure compliance with local standards when building or installing new equipment.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: The provided search results include various planning documents and agendas from Stevenage council, but not all specifically focus on customer-centric information regarding council services for solar panels. Nevertheless, the analyzed links provide useful information about solar panel installations, planning permission requirements, and design guidelines.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: Consider expanding the search to include other sources like the council's official site or dedicated renewable energy resources to address more comprehensive customer needs for solar panel-related information.
